abstract: Study undertaken by University of California statisticians designed to address critiques of climate science by skeptics has confirmed that 'global warming is real' and that the world's average land temperature has risen since the mid-1950s; longtime critics of climate science are not satisfied with the report.
snippet: A study designed to erase doubts about climate science left critics unsatisfied with the findings.
lead_paragraph: A study designed to erase doubts about climate science left critics unsatisfied with the findings.

headline.seo: New Berkeley Study Does Not Sway Global-Warming Skeptics
